item.title: Comment on If you must discuss today’s events… by Karl Pooper
item.description:
Reply to Ska:

That's why you look at your neighbors' names and remember a couple who hadn't shown up yet. You can vote for both!

Today I visited my grandmother and found out she vote for Kamala. I was so mad, I knocked over a flower vase on my way out of the cemetary.

item.title: Comment on If you must discuss today’s events… by Pepé Silvia
item.description:
Reply to Turnabout is fair play:

I suspect we will see, two decades after Trump talked about grabbing women by their pussy, that women are about to grab him by his balls. Then kiss him goodbye, since voters are allowed to do that.

Democrats would have had this in the bag months ago if they hadn't tried to gaslight everybody into believing Biden wasn't a walking corpse and then panicked when the disinformation became too obvious, shoving their weak and borderline incompetent DEI candidate to the front of the line. If Trump wins a second term, it'll be progressive ideology that elected him.
